text: Say Anything... is a 1989 American romantic comedy-drama movie directed by first time director Cameron Crowe and starring John Cusack, Ione Skye, John Mahoney, Lili Taylor, Polly Platt, Pamela Adlon, Chynna Phillips, Eric Stoltz, Jeremy Piven, Jason Gould, Bebe Neuwirth. It was distributed by 20th Century Fox. ==Other websites== * * Category:1989 romantic comedy movies Category:1989 romantic drama movies Category:American romantic comedy movies Category:American romantic drama movies Category:20th Century Fox movies Category:Movies directed by Cameron Crowe
title: Say Anything...
